content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > love crochet and connecting with other > makers click here to join the sweet > bee crochet facebook community 1 a simple ridged border is paired with a classic v_stitch centre making this scarf a wonderful addition to your winter accessories it would also be a cozy wearable for cooler days in the spring and fall this scarf looks beautiful in both solid and multi-coloured shades and has a simple row repeat that is easy to crochet if you would like to extend the length special stitch tutorials along with helpful photos are included **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 392-393 yards of worsted weight acrylic yarn i used wecrochet heatherly in the gravity colourway - 4mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
